data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Jawa Barat, Indonesia.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jawa Barat, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Jawa Barat, Indonesia to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.section_summary: On average, 79 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Jawa Barat, Indonesia.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Jawa Barat
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 1,452,726 believers in Jawa Barat against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Hindi people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, let the threatened of Jawa Barat, Indonesia know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Jawa Barat to agree with you and with one another.
Spirit, teach the church in the state of Jawa Barat to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

location.name: Jawa Barat
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Mandarin, Han Chinese, Min Nan, Dutch, Arab, general, Banten
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Han Chinese, Mandarin (1,291,000), Han Chinese, Min Nan (1,023,000), Dutch (17,000), Arab, general (280,000), Banten (3,194,000)
